Package edu.cccnj.FivePoints.Components.Light

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LightPost
    As with real traffic lights, a LightPost itself is made up of 4 synchronized faces.
    SynchronizedPanel
    Creates a synchronization between two TrafficLights.
    TrafficLight
    The TrafficLight changes its colors based on variable intervals.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LightColor
    Enumeration class LightColor - The three colors a TrafficLight can be RED, YELLOW, RED
    LightSuggestion
    A simple enum for determining whether or not a car should proceed through a traffic light.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    LightColorException
    This is the Exception thrown when the TrafficLight tries to interact with a color of unspecified interval.
